mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (orders_no, board_content, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{ordersNo}, #{boardContent}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_content AS boardContent, b.create_date AS createDate, a.customer_mail AS customerMail, g.goods_no AS goodsNo FROM board b JOIN orders o ON o.orders_no = b.orders_no JOIN payment p ON p.payment_no = o.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no JOIN goods g ON g.goods_no = o.goods_no WHERE g.goods_no = ${goodsNo}
